articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Europe heatwave: France braces for record-breaking temperatures as Spain battles forest fires - The Guardian
articles.description: Temperature could exceed 42C in parts of France as scientists warn heatwaves will hit earlier than usual due to climate change
articles.content:
France, Spain and other western European nations braced for a sweltering weekend that is set to break records and sparked concern about forest fires and the effects of climate change.

articles.title: Ukraine moves closer to EU membership as Putin again slams 'insane' Western sanctions - CBC News
articles.description: The European Union's executive arm recommended putting Ukraine on a path to membership on Friday, a symbolic boost for a country fending off a Russian onslaught that is killing civilians, flattening cities and threatening its very survival.
